timeline.bodyText: The package should be consistent with the other classes.
timeline.author: gsmet

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/integration-tests/resteasy-client/src/test/java/org/acme/rest/client/multipart/MultipartResourceIT.java b/integration-tests/rest-client/src/test/java/io/quarkus/it/rest/client/MultipartResourceIT.java
similarity index 76%
rename from integration-tests/resteasy-client/src/test/java/org/acme/rest/client/multipart/MultipartResourceIT.java
rename to integration-tests/rest-client/src/test/java/io/quarkus/it/rest/client/MultipartResourceIT.java
index d08142909a..7e9df3033d 100644
--- a/integration-tests/resteasy-client/src/test/java/org/acme/rest/client/multipart/MultipartResourceIT.java
+++ b/integration-tests/rest-client/src/test/java/io/quarkus/it/rest/client/MultipartResourceIT.java

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-package org.acme.rest.client.multipart;
+package io.quarkus.it.rest.client;
 
 import io.quarkus.test.junit.NativeImageTest;
